definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Can bate is corneous, send skin depth nutrition at the same time.

sentences.english: ResultsThere is little difference of effect on the components of Fructus Chaenomelis intenerated by the two methods.

sentences.english: Plastics will soften when exposed to heat.

sentences.english: Jack Daniels's whiskey is mellowed using Sugar Maple charcoal.

sentences.english: A stool softener or laxative may be ordered.

sentences.english: Objective To explore diagnosis and countermeasure of tracheomalacia in thyroidectomy.

sentences.english: Liquid and sheet fabric softener works well.

sentences.english: Linseed oil will soften stiff leather.

sentences.english: Young age and laryngeal or tracheal-bronchial malacia are high-risk factors for complications .

sentences.english: You can add plaid or even floral cushions to soften the effect if you want.

sentences.english: They are at risk for a condition called osteomalacia.

sentences.english: The equilibrium grease secrete, softens the horniness, improvement skin.

sentences.english: To prevent and cure osteomalacia you should take more calcium lactate.
sentences.chinese: 为了防治骨软化，你应该多服用一些乳酸钙。

sentences.english: It mellowed his mood toward her.
sentences.chinese: 这使他对她的心情软化了。

definition: to melt/to thaw/to dissolve/to blend into/to combine/to fuse
to freeze/to solidify/to congeal/fig. with rapt attention
to spread out after being diluted or melted/to dissolve into a liquid
to heat/to add warmth/to raise temperature/fig. to stimulate
